section.name: what-is-phemto
section.title: What is Phemto?
section.p: In jargon speak, Phemto is a lightweight, highly automated, dependency injection container. In simpler terms, Phemto's job is to create objects from as little information as possible; dramatically reducing coupling within an application or framework.
Why is this useful? Creating objects in your application with hard code new statements is very explicit, but it makes things difficult to change later.
